Package ngoy.common

Common module.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CapitalizePipe
    Capitalizes the input using the current locale.
    CommonModule
    Common module.
    DatePipe
    Formats a LocalDateTime, LocalDate or Date/Long instance in the current locale, accepting an optional format pattern as the first argument.
    DatePipe.Config
    Provide a Config to override default format patterns.
    ListPipe
    Outputs the input object array as a List.
    LowerCasePipe
    Transforms the input to lowercase using the current locale.
    MapPipe
    Outputs the input object pairs array as a Map.
    RawPipe
    Outputs the input object as raw, unescaped text.
    SetPipe
    Outputs the input object array as a Set.
    UpperCasePipe
    Transforms the input to uppercase using the current locale.

Package ngoy.common Description

Common module.
